description:
Take your little one out for a run with this Chariot jogging adapter kit.

  • Thule’s VersaWing™ means tool free installation
  • Tracking adjustment knob keeps your chariot rolling wherever you point it, no drift
  • Pneumatic front tire rolls easily over uneven terrain
  • Works with Thule Chariot Sport, Thule Chariot Cross and Thule Chariot Lite
name: Thule Chariot Jog Kit 1 - Lite/Cross
